name: Oxygen Forensics Important Data Backup
summary: An OFBR file is a backup file created by Oxygen Forensics Detective, an application used to extract data from devices and analyze the information. It contains data extracted from a device, such as a laptop, mobile device, or cloud storage service, and imported into Detective. OFBR files are similar to .OFBX backup files but only store data designated as important by the user instead of the entire data.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
